channel.title: 美国环保署批准对新冠肺炎使用来苏消毒喷雾
channel.description: 美国环保署批准对新冠肺炎使用来苏消毒喷雾

item.title: 美国环保署批准对新冠肺炎使用来苏消毒喷雾[0-50]
item.description:
美国环保署批准对新冠肺炎使用来苏消毒喷雾 (Reuters) - UK-based Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc (RB.L) said on Tuesday that the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has approved useof its Lysol Disinfectant Spray against COVID-19.
(路透社)-总部位于英国的利洁时集团(Reckitt Benckier Group Plc)周二表示，美国环境保护局(EPA)已批准对新冠肺炎使用其莱索尔消毒喷雾。
The U.S. EPA said in a statement that the agency had approved two products, Lysol Disinfectant Spray and Lysol Disinfectant Max Cover Mist, based on laboratory testing that showed the products were effective against COVID-19.
美国环保署在一份声明中表示，该机构已经批准了两种产品，莱索尔消毒剂喷雾剂和莱索尔消毒剂MAX Cover Mist，根据实验室测试，这两种产品对新冠肺炎有效。
Reckitt Benckiser reported record sales growth in the first quarter and predicted a stronger-than-expected performance in 2020 as customers stocked up on Lysol disinfectants, Mucinex cough syrup and Dettol soap ahead of the coronavirus lockdowns.
利洁时(Reckitt Benckier)报告称，第一季度销售额增长创纪录，并预测2020年的表现强于预期，因为客户在冠状病毒封城之前囤积了莱索尔消毒剂、Mucinex咳嗽糖浆和Dettol肥皂。
“Lysol is currently testing the efficacy of other disinfectant products in the brand portfolio,” Ferran Rousaud, marketing director for Lysol, said in a statement.
“莱索尔目前正在测试品牌组合中其他消毒产品的功效，”莱索尔的营销总监Ferran Rousaud在一份声明中说。

美国环保署批准对新冠肺炎使用来苏消毒喷雾
(Reuters) - UK-based Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc (RB.L) said on Tuesday that the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has approved useof its Lysol Disinfectant Spray against COVID-19.
(路透社)-总部位于英国的利洁时集团(Reckitt Benckier Group Plc)周二表示，美国环境保护局(EPA)已批准对新冠肺炎使用其莱索尔消毒喷雾。
The U.S. EPA said in a statement that the agency had approved two products, Lysol Disinfectant Spray and Lysol Disinfectant Max Cover Mist, based on laboratory testing that showed the products were effective against COVID-19.
美国环保署在一份声明中表示，该机构已经批准了两种产品，莱索尔消毒剂喷雾剂和莱索尔消毒剂MAX Cover Mist，根据实验室测试，这两种产品对新冠肺炎有效。
Reckitt Benckiser reported record sales growth in the first quarter and predicted a stronger-than-expected performance in 2020 as customers stocked up on Lysol disinfectants, Mucinex cough syrup and Dettol soap ahead of the coronavirus lockdowns.
利洁时(Reckitt Benckier)报告称，第一季度销售额增长创纪录，并预测2020年的表现强于预期，因为客户在冠状病毒封城之前囤积了莱索尔消毒剂、Mucinex咳嗽糖浆和Dettol肥皂。
“Lysol is currently testing the efficacy of other disinfectant products in the brand portfolio,” Ferran Rousaud, marketing director for Lysol, said in a statement.
“莱索尔目前正在测试品牌组合中其他消毒产品的功效，”莱索尔的营销总监Ferran Rousaud在一份声明中说。

xyzzy:
这是来苏儿牌产品，发明于光绪年间，当时是煤酚皂溶液，也就是现在医院里用的来苏儿，但现在已经分多产品线含不同成分了，毕竟正宗配方刺激性还是有点强。
